pre_conversation.line: Jackie Welles: Hey, cmon, Stins, give us a break hun? You lock us up, we'll just jerk off till trial, and then what? Worst case, ugh, we get some months. Hell, standin room only nowadays in el bote, so… we'll prob'ly be out early.
Jackie Welles: Honestly, for a sec there, things looked iffy. Wasn't sure we'd worm outta that alive.
Jackie Welles: If I hadn't come, you'd be cruisin' Night City in sexy wheels right now.
Jackie Welles: So, maybe now, as God ordained. Jackie Welles.
Jackie Welles: She's my blood, all right. Coyote's her dive. It's strange you and I never met before.

Jackie Welles: Cartels? No, no, listen, I know those cartel types, and I guarantee you none of 'em have even heard of Kirk. El cabrón's gotta learn… he don't do people in Heywood dirty. C'mon, let's go have some lunch.
Jackie Welles: You help my homies, you're OK in my book. No harm, no foul.
Jackie Welles: Gettin' one of my good feelings.
Jackie Welles: 'Bout us. Sense a kind of chemistry, y'know? C'mon. I'm fuckin' starved.

Jackie Welles: Chick we're looking for's somewhere in this building. Probably crawlin' with the pendejos that kidnapped her. Eyes and ears open, all right? Speakin' of which… got you a little somethin', Militech training shard. 'Case you need to, uh, brush up on your dance moves. Down for some target practice in VR?
Jackie Welles: Low profile! Grr, are we fuckin' late?! Is that her, is that our target, V?! V… check this chica.
Jackie Welles: V, mira, eyes up, pendejos ahead. Drop him quiet, V.

Jackie Welles: Shit, V. I mean, I got a stomach o' steel, but… this, wao, this. I wasn't made for this shit, you know - chop shops? What they do to people…? Fuckin' scav psychos. No more jobs like this. Te lo juro por mi madre…
Jackie Welles: Platinum? Shiiit, Trauma shoulda swooped in if she sneezed.
Jackie Welles: Ay, pobrecita. Let's get her off that ice.
Jackie Welles: Locked an' ready, hermano. Do your thing.
Jackie Welles: Fuera, cabrón. Get her outside! Hm… Scavrats abandoning ship. Musta seen Trauma, decided to cut their losses.
Jackie Welles: Nah, mano. Not just any other city. Morgan Blackhand, Andrew Weyland, Adam Smasher. Legends are born here. Man, I'm starvin’. Let's grab a tight-bite. Whaddaya say?
Jackie Welles: Officer, ma'am! Damn are we ever lucky we ran into you.
Jackie Welles: Ad, a heart of gold? 'Course only somebody with a heart of gold can understand just how much I need to get back to my girl.
Jackie Welles: Uh-huh. Gonna be worried sick if I don't show. I mean, I'm tryin' to be a stand-up guy. She giving me a chance, waiting.

Jackie Welles: 'Cause they ain't your average badges. That's MaxTac - NCPD's apex predators. MTac rolls in when things fly outta hand. Gonks out there, though, just a midday snack for 'em. Welp, show's over. Poor bastards… but they had it comin'.

Jackie Welles: Whaddaya mean? What's there not to like? Noodles - check. Synthsirloin - check. Get some more chill action up in here, and you're lookin' at Moma Welles’ signature sopa de fideos (noodle soup), hahah!
Jackie Welles: First stop - ripperdoc? An', holmes, easy on the gas, uh? I just ate. Oh, was supposed to stop by Vik's anyhow. I got a date - me and Misty.
Jackie Welles: Started climbin' our way up. Got more on more knives out there, waitin' to stab us in the back. Higher stakes, higher risk mano. She can see that.
